oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rock House Holiness Church service, 1999 April 23
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hood, Ralph W.; Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of service during which Jamie Coots preaches. The recording concludes with a brief interview with Coots during which he shows and describes his 1998 December 26 snakebite injury in the process of self-amputation.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region, Southern -- Religious life and customs; Dance -- Religious aspects; Glossolalia; Imposition of hands; Pentecostal preaching; Prayer; Singing--Religious aspects; Snakebites; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region, Southern; Witness bearing (Christianity)
Brown, Brenda; Brown, John, Sr.; Coots, Jamie, (Gregory James), 1971-2014; Dukes, Glenn; Dunn, Rayford; Lemming, Billy; Short, Gene; Tucker, Diane; Wade, James
Rock House Holiness Church (Sand Mountain, Ala.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Rock House Holiness Church field recordings, 1996-2004
Ralph W. Hood and W. Paul Williamson field recordings, interviews, and photographs
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Ralph W. Hood and W. Paul Williamson Holiness Churches of Appalachia recordings and interviews
